description: Try our easy to follow Monster Cupcakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Monster Cupcakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 21ml food colouring (green and yellow food colouring)
100g Flora Plant Based Butter Lightly Salted
250g Flora Plant Based Butter Lightly Salted

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 170Â°C. Line a 12-hole muffin pan with cupcake liners. Place plant-based butter and sugar in a bowl and beat with an electric mixer for 5 minutes or until pale and creamy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating for 1 minute between each addition. Add vanilla and mix to combine. Add flour and milk, in 2 batches, mixing until just combined.

Divide half the mixture among cupcake liners and bake for 15 minutes or until a skewer inserted into centres comes out clean. Remove from pan and allow to cool on a wire rack. Repeat to make second batch.

To make the icing, mix plantbased butter, icing sugar and milk until thoroughly combined. Divide mixture into 3 small bowls, reserving some icing. Add a few drops of food colouring to 3 bowls to colour as desired. Transfer coloured icing to a piping bags (or snaplock bags with corners snipped) and pipe onto cupcakes, using decorative piping tips. Alternatively, use a small spoon to dab on icing to create peaks to represent monster fur. Use reserved icing to pipe teeth on Oreos and place on icing. Decorate with candy eyeballs for eyes and serve.
